channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 14:21 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region. Since further reports.
item.description: 🟢 14:21 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region. Since further reports.#Chernihiv_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:00 free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
